title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter
OB: The display property of an item is set to 'none', but it does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property as 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new PDF emitter.

Expected Behavior:
The item with the display property set to 'none' should not be visible in the generated PDF.

Observed Behavior:
The item with the display property set to 'none' is still visible in the generated PDF.
